sourcesContent:
<template>
	<view class="wrapper">
		<view class="search-box">
			<view class="sca-code">
				<image src="../../static/tab/sca-code.png" mode="widthFix"></image>
			</view>
			<view class="search-input">
				<image src="../../static/tab/search.png" mode="widthFix"></image>
				<input type="text" value="" placeholder="请输入内容" />
			</view>
			<view class="search-more">
				<image src="../../static/tab/more.png" mode="widthFix"></image>
			</view>
		</view>
		<view class="banner-box">
			<swiper :indicator-dots="true" :autoplay="false" :interval="3000" :duration="500" circular="true">
				<swiper-item>
					<view class="swiper-item">
						<image src="http://img.zcool.cn/community/01e5895a3dd4dba801206ed35b281c.JPG@1280w_1l_2o_100sh.jpg" mode="aspectFill"></image>
					</view>
				</swiper-item>

				<swiper-item>

					<view class="swiper-item">
						<image src="https://timgsa.baidu.com/timg?image&quality=80&size=b9999_10000&sec=1576592677884&di=3f90cc079cad46c09b000f7bd20308fe&imgtype=0&src=http%3A%2F%2Fcdn2.ettoday.net%2Fimages%2F2643%2F2643579.jpg"
						 mode="aspectFill"></image>
					</view>
				</swiper-item>

				<swiper-item>

					<view class="swiper-item">
						<image src="https://timgsa.baidu.com/timg?image&quality=80&size=b9999_10000&sec=1576592677878&di=67b4e024bc095b35f7523eb4383b950c&imgtype=0&src=http%3A%2F%2Fi2.wp.com%2Fdsbar.cc%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2018%2F08%2Fds8-319-1.png%3Fresize%3D637%2C446"
						 mode="aspectFill"></image>
					</view>
				</swiper-item>
			</swiper>
		</view>
		<view class="icon-box">
			<view class="item" v-for="(value,index) in iconType" :key="index">
				<icon :type="value" size="26" />
				<text>{{value}}</text>
			</view>
		</view>
	</view>
</template>

<script>
	export default {
		props: {
			iconType: {
				type: Array
			}
		},
		data() {
			return {
				// iconType:['success', 'success_no_circle', 'info', 'warn', 'waiting', 'cancel', 'download', 'search', 'clear']
			}
		}
	}
</script>

<style>
	.wrapper {
		width: 100%;
	}

	.search-box {
		display: flex;
		justify-content: space-between;
		width: 100%;
		padding-top: 30upx;
		padding-left: 10upx;
		padding-right: 10upx;
		padding-bottom: 30upx;
		background-image: linear-gradient(to top, #4CD964 10%, #4CD950 100%);
		box-sizing: border-box;
	}

	.sca-code {
		width: 40upx;
		height: 40upx;
	}

	.sca-code image {
		width: 100%;
		height: 100%;
		vertical-align: middle;
	}

	.search-input {
		width: 80%;
		height: 60upx;
		display: flex;
		background-color: #F1F1F1;
		align-items: center;
		padding-left: 30upx;
		border-bottom-left-radius: 100upx;
		border-bottom-right-radius: 100upx;
		border-top-left-radius: 100upx;
	}

	.search-input image {
		vertical-align: middle;
		width: 40upx;
		height: 40upx;
	}

	.search-more {
		/* margin-right: 30upx; */
		width: 40upx;
		height: 40upx;
	}

	.search-more image {
		width: 100%;
		height: 100%;
		vertical-align: middle;
	}

	swiper {
		width: 100% !important;
		height: 400upx !important;
	}

	.banner-box {
		width: 100%;
	}

	swiper-item,
	image {
		width: 100%;
		height: 100%;
	}

	.swiper-item {
		width: 100% !important;
		height: 100%;
	}

	.item {
		display: flex;
		flex-direction: column;
		width: 30%;
		text-align: center;
		margin: 20rpx auto;
		overflow-wrap: break-word;
	}
	.icon-box{
		display: flex;
		justify-content: space-between;
		flex-direction: row;
		flex-wrap: wrap;
		align-items: center;
	}
</style>
